title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama and chat with local models in a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: First-party LangChain integration letting you swap Ollama models into any LangChain chain or agent.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama—no API keys needed.

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Lightweight CLI wrapper that turns Ollama into your shell copilot with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal React chatbot example that streams responses from a local Ollama server.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Retrieval-augmented generation pipeline combining Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting streaming chat, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that brings Ollama code completion and inline chat to your editor.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension providing a sidebar chat window powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-express
summary: Official Express.js starter that exposes an OpenAI-compatible REST proxy for Ollama.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Telegram bot that lets groups chat with local Ollama models through a webhook.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team—use local LLMs as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama replies into threads with slash-command support.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama chat and embedding endpoints with admin UI for model selection.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client for Ollama using reqwest and serde; published on crates.io.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Community Spring Boot starter that autoconfigures an OllamaRestTemplate for Java services.
